COURSE/DEGREE AWARDING 
INSTITUTIONS  
DIRECT ENTRY  UTME  UTME SUBJECTS  SPECIAL CONSIDERATION (WAIVER) REMARKS  
    (xvi) UNN accepts five(5)‘O’ level credit pass in 
Government in lieu of History and three (3) 
other Arts or Social Science subjects.  
(xvii) UNN, ABU require five (5) 'O' level credit passes 
in English Language, History/Governmentplus 
any three other subjects. UTME SUBJECTS  
(i) ABU requires History or Government and any 
other two (2) subjects from Arts and Social 
Sciences.  
(ii) ABUJA and FED -LOKOJA ac cept Government in 
lieu of History.  
(iii) BENIN accepts History or Government, one (1) 
Arts subject and any other subject.  
(iv) FED-LAFIA requires CRS/IS and any other relevant 
subject.  
(v) FED-LOKOJA accepts History/Government and 
any other two (2) subjects from Arts  or Social 
Sciences  
(vi) LAGOS requires History/Government and any 
other two (2) subjects from Arts or one (1) from 
Arts and one from Social Sciences.  
(vii) OAU requires History and any two (2) Arts 
subjects.  
(viii) SAU accepts Government in lieu of History.  
(ix) UNIZIK requires Literature in English, History/ 
Government and any other Arts or Social Science 
subject.  
(x) UNN accepts History or Government and two 
other Arts or Social Science subjects.  
HISTORY AND  
INTERNATIONAL STUDIES

AAUA

passes/NCE (upper 
credit) in History/ 
Government and any 
other related subject.

include English Language,  
Geography,  
Government/History.

nt and any other 
two (2) subjects 
from Arts andSocial
